package.name: basedirs
package.install: mkdir -pv ${CHROOTDIR}/{bin,boot,etc,opt,home,lib,mnt,opt,dev,proc,sys} mkdir -pv ${CHROOTDIR}/{media,sbin,srv,var} mkdir -pv ${CHROOTDIR}/llbuild/{build,src} install -dv -m 0750 ${CHROOTDIR}/root install -dv -m 1777 ${CHROOTDIR}/tmp ${CHROOTDIR}/var/tmp mkdir -pv ${CHROOTDIR}/usr/{,local/}{bin,include,lib,sbin,src} mkdir -pv ${CHROOTDIR}/usr/{,local/}share/{doc,info,locale,man} mkdir -v ${CHROOTDIR}/usr/{,local/}share/{misc,terminfo,zoneinfo} mkdir -pv ${CHROOTDIR}/usr/{,local/}share/man/man{1..8} for dir in /usr /usr/local do ln -sv share/{man,doc,info} ${CHROOTDIR}/${dir} done case $(uname -m) in x86_64) ln -sv lib ${CHROOTDIR}/lib64 && ln -sv lib ${CHROOTDIR}/usr/lib64 ;; esac mkdir -v ${CHROOTDIR}/var/{lock,log,mail,run,spool} mkdir -pv ${CHROOTDIR}/var/{opt,cache,lib/{misc,locate},local} touch ${CHROOTDIR}/etc/mtab cat > ${CHROOTDIR}/etc/passwd << "EOF" root:x:0:0:root:/root:/bin/bash toro:x:0:0:root:/root:/bin/sh daemon:x:1:1:daemon:/usr/sbin:/bin/sh bin:x:2:2:bin:/bin:/bin/sh sys:x:3:3:sys:/dev:/bin/sh nobody:x:99:99:Unprivileged User:/dev/null:/bin/false EOF cat > ${CHROOTDIR}/etc/group << "EOF" root:x:0: daemon:x:1: bin:x:2: sys:x:3: kmem:x:4: tty:x:5: tape:x:6: floppy:x:7: disk:x:8: lp:x:9: uucp:x:10: audio:x:11:surfer video:x:12: utmp:x:13: usb:x:14: dialout:x:15: disk:x:16: ssh:x:22: mail:x:34: www:x:80: nogroup:x:99: EOF echo "127.0.0.1 localhost $(hostname)" > ${CHROOTDIR}/etc/hosts touch ${CHROOTDIR}/var/run/utmp ${CHROOTDIR}/var/log/{btmp,lastlog,wtmp} chgrp -v 13 ${CHROOTDIR}/var/run/utmp ${CHROOTDIR}/var/log/lastlog chmod -v 664 ${CHROOTDIR}/var/run/utmp ${CHROOTDIR}/var/log/lastlog
